scripts.dev: node scripts/ensure-monai.js && node scripts/ensure-segvol.js && npm run dev:setup && NODE_ENV=development tsx watch server/index.ts
scripts.dev:itk: npm run dev:setup && DICOM_REG_CONVERTER=/Users/joshua/Documents/CONVERGE_REPLIT_VIEWER/build/dicom-reg-converter/dicom_reg_to_h5 FUSEBOX_PYTHON=/Users/joshua/Documents/CONVERGE_REPLIT_VIEWER/sam_env/bin/python PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=development tsx watch server/index.ts
scripts.dev:replit: npm run dev:setup:replit && NODE_ENV=development tsx watch server/index.ts
scripts.dev:setup: node -e "console.log('üîß Checking Fusebox setup...'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const helperPath = path.join(__dirname, 'build/dicom-reg-converter/dicom_reg_to_h5'); const pythonPath = path.join(__dirname, 'sam_env/bin/python'); if (!fs.existsSync(helperPath)) { console.error('‚ùå DICOM helper not found at:', helperPath); console.error('Run: cmake --build build/dicom-reg-converter'); process.exit(1); } if (!fs.existsSync(pythonPath)) { console.error('‚ùå Python venv not found at:', pythonPath); console.error('Run: python -m venv sam_env && source sam_env/bin/activate && pip install -e .'); process.exit(1); } console.log('‚úÖ Fusebox setup verified'); console.log('üêü DICOM helper:', helperPath); console.log('üêç Python interpreter:', pythonPath);"
scripts.dev:setup:replit: node -e "console.log('üîß Checking Replit Fusebox setup...'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const workspace = process.env.REPLIT_WORKSPACE || __dirname; const helperPath = path.join(workspace, 'build/dicom-reg-converter/dicom_reg_to_h5'); const pythonPath = path.join(workspace, 'sam_env/bin/python'); if (!fs.existsSync(helperPath)) { console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è DICOM helper not found at:', helperPath, '(will use fallback)'); process.env.DICOM_REG_CONVERTER = ''; } else { console.log('‚úÖ DICOM helper found:', helperPath); process.env.DICOM_REG_CONVERTER = helperPath; } if (!fs.existsSync(pythonPath)) { console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è Python venv not found at:', pythonPath, '(will use system Python)'); process.env.FUSEBOX_PYTHON = 'python3'; } else { console.log('‚úÖ Python venv found:', pythonPath); process.env.FUSEBOX_PYTHON = pythonPath; } console.log('üöÄ Replit setup complete'); console.log('üêü DICOM helper:', process.env.DICOM_REG_CONVERTER || 'fallback mode'); console.log('üêç Python interpreter:', process.env.FUSEBOX_PYTHON);"
scripts.setup:new-dev: npm install && ./scripts/sync-test-data.sh download && npm run dev:setup
